global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”|10vw|10vw|10vw|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://happybirthday.keepsake.id/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/02/Section-3.1-1-1.png” title_text=”Section 3.1 (1) (1)” align=”right” _builder_version=”4.20.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|-10vw||-10vw|false|true” scroll_vertical_motion_enable=”on” scroll_vertical_motion=”0|50|50|100|2|0|0″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”50px” header_2_letter_spacing=”3px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” custom_margin=”54px|||||” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

i’m so glad

to have you in my life and to be able to call you my girlfriend. you have a heart of gold and a soul that radiates warmth and kindness. you are the most beautiful person i have ever met, both inside and out.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.20.0″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” custom_padding=”|10vw|10vw|10vw|false|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://happybirthday.keepsake.id/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/02/Section-3.2-1-1.png” title_text=”Section 3.2 (1) (1)” _builder_version=”4.20.0″ _module_preset=”default” custom_margin=”|-10vw||-10vw|false|true” scroll_vertical_motion_enable=”on” scroll_vertical_motion=”0|100|100|100|-0.5|0|0″ motion_trigger_start=”top” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.20.0″ text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” ul_line_height=”1.8em” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”50px” header_2_letter_spacing=”3px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”70px||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

as we are together,

i wanted to take a moment to let you know how much you mean to me. i want you to know that i am committed to making every birthday and every day of your life special. i promise to always put you first and to do everything in my power to make you feel loved, appreciated, and valued.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”About” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#f8f5f3″ background_enable_image=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#2B343B” header_2_font_size=”80px” header_2_letter_spacing=”6px” header_2_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” header_2_font_size_tablet=”40px” header_2_font_size_phone=”30px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Once again

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ border_width_all=”20px” border_color_all=”#2B343B” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://happybirthday.keepsake.id/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/02/Section-4-4-1.png” title_text=”Section 4 (4) (1)” _builder_version=”4.20.0″ transform_origin=”0%|100%” custom_margin=”-6vw||-24vw|-30vw|false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”0vw||0vw|0vw|false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_rotating_enable=”on” scroll_rotating=”0|100|100|100|14°|0°|0″ scroll_rotating_tablet=”0|100|100|100|0°|0°|0″ scroll_rotating_phone=”” scroll_rotating_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”7vw||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”2em” max_width=”800px” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”14px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_line_height_phone=”1.6em” text_line_height_last_edited=”off|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

happy birthday my love, my best friend, my soulmate, and my partner in crime. thank you for being an amazing girlfriend, for loving me unconditionally, and for being the most incredible person that i have ever met.

i wish you all the love, happiness, and success in the world. may all your dreams and wishes come true, and may this year be filled with new adventures and unforgettable moments. i look forward to sharing many more birthdays with you and making many more wonderful memories together.


may your day be filled with all the joy and love that you deserve. i love you more than words can express <3

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Testimonials” _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#f8f5f3″ background_enable_image=”off” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ background_enable_color=”off” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_slider show_arrows=”off” dot_nav_custom_color=”#2b343b” _builder_version=”4.20.0″ body_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” body_text_color=”#2b343b” body_font_size=”48px” body_line_height=”1.4em” background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” custom_padding=”0px|0px||0px|false|false” body_font_size_tablet=”25px” body_font_size_phone=”16px” body_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_shadow_style=”preset5″ text_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”4.20.0″ custom_padding=”180px||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

happy birthday, love! <3

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.20.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]
[/et_pb_code][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
